Text:
not a music video just her singing.

video: 10
audio: 2 the sound is a few seconds late and now i cant stop staring at her lips laughing like one of those american movies on the spanish channel

Somethings wrong with the software you're using to play the video; the audios in perfect sync.  

The picture's super sharp, and they're playing with acoustic guitars, with the beat a little slower than normal.  Worth the download for any Avril fan!
